title: Modern champions are so disgustingly overloaded
body:
Old champions:

{{champion:63}} Going.
{{champion:2}} I'm going.
{{champion:55}} Intriguing.
{{champion:45}} Yes! (Laughs)

New/reworked champions:

{{champion:145}} You know that feeling when your skin crawls? Like a thousand needles poking through every pore? Blood pounding through every vein? That's just an itch compared to what lives on me.
{{champion:20}} (Willump noises) Uhuh. (Willump noises) No way! (Willump noises) Woah, that's the best story my ears ever heard! (Willump noises) But... no one got hit in the face with a snowball. (Willump noises) 'Til now! Got you, you big galumpa! (Laughs) (Willump noises)

replies.body:
{{champion:33}}: "Ok."

_after rework_

{{champion:33}}: "Okay."

Rito u better not do dis.
